changes.description: Added multi-guild support - track resources for multiple Discord servers in one deployment
Implemented Discord server membership-based guild isolation for enhanced security
Added automatic admin access for Discord server owners - no role configuration required
Created guild selector on resources page to switch between your guilds
Added in-game guild ID field for better Discord-to-game integration
Rebranded from 'Dune Awakening Guild' to 'Guild Resource Tracker' for generic use
Updated deployment URL from hm-resource-tracker to trz-resource-tracker
Disabled automatic 'What's New' popup - now shows only when clicking version number
Reduced excessive console logging for role permission checks
Enhanced resource detail pages with guild validation
Fixed resource access issues - users can only view resources from their Discord servers
Fixed server owner permission checks across all API endpoints
Fixed resource detail page 'Resource Not Found' errors for all guilds
Fixed OAuth redirect issues during URL migration
Added comprehensive points-based leaderboard system to track user contributions
Created new leaderboard database table to track all point-earning actions
Added resource multiplier system (0.1x to 5x+) affecting points earned
Implemented intelligent points calculation: 0.1 base points per resource, multiplied by resource multiplier and status bonus
Added status-based point bonuses: +10% for Critical resources, +5% for Below Target resources
Created special point rules: SET actions earn fixed 1 point, Refined category actions earn fixed 2 points
Added congratulations popup showing points earned when updating resources
Replaced top contributors section with expandable global leaderboard on resources page
Created dedicated full leaderboard page (/dashboard/leaderboard) with comprehensive rankings
Added user contributions page (/dashboard/contributions/[userId]) showing detailed point history
Implemented time-based filtering for leaderboards (last 24 hours, 7 days, 30 days, all time)
Added pagination to both leaderboard and contributions pages (20 items per page)
Restored resource-specific Top Contributors/Consumers alongside global points leaderboard on individual resource pages
Added new Multiplier column to resource table view with color-coded display (purple 3x+, blue 2x+, green 1x+, orange <1x, gray 0x)
Enhanced grid view with multiplier badges using same color-coding system
Added multiplier input fields to admin resource creation and editing forms
Optimized table layout by removing Last Updated column and reducing padding for better fit
Enhanced dark mode compatibility for all new UI components
Added automatic leaderboard refresh when history entries are deleted
Fixed user ID tracking to properly use Discord nicknames instead of 'unknown'
Fixed status bonus calculation to use real-time resource status rather than cached database values
Fixed congratulations popup text visibility in dark mode
Fixed status text color in table view for proper dark mode display
Fixed multiplier display for 0x multipliers to show '0x' instead of '1.0x'
Fixed date handling errors on individual resource pages
Fixed null pointer errors in user contributions summary calculations
